key_risks: Supply chain disruptions due to semiconductor shortages and global constraints
Integration risks from the 2022 merger with ADVA Optical Networking
Intense competition from industry giants like Cisco, Nokia, and Huawei
Financial performance impacted by macroeconomic challenges and inventory corrections
controversies: Wider-than-expected Q3 2024 loss and missed earnings expectations
Restructuring and integration expenses affecting short-term profitability
environmental_issues: None explicitly mentioned, but sustainability initiatives are in place
social_issues: None explicitly mentioned, but ethical supply chain practices are promoted
governance_issues: None explicitly mentioned, but robust corporate governance framework is maintained
